title: Special Provisions for Institutional, Assembly, Business or Mercantile and Industrial Buildings: A Crèche of minimum 40 sq
clause_text: Special Provisions for Institutional, Assembly, Business or Mercantile and Industrial Buildings: A Crèche of minimum 40 sq. mBUA shall be provided for Institutional, Assembly, Business or Mercantile Building where total number of employeesis 1000or more.

source_pdf.text_snippet: Special Provisions for Institutional, Assembly, Business or Mercantile and Industrial Buildings: A Crèche of minimum 40 sq. mBUA shall be provided for Institutional, Assembly, Business or Mercantile B
